person.persName: Alexander Wallace Blair (Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha B. Moore Blair in Nicholas County, Kentucky on August 2, 1841. Father of William Blair, John Blair, James Blair, Harlan Blair, Thomas P. Blair, J.W. Blair, Martha Blair, Robert Blair, and Wallace Blair. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Employed Charles Aynes as a farm laborer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned one enslaved individual in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned one enslaved individual in Nicholas County in 1860.
